name: Maio Software House
tagline: We give you IT solutions for growing your business
description: By outsourcing your software solutions to Maio, you win well-mixed team of experts with international experience. Calls, chats, online communicators – these are tools we use on a daily basis in order to keep our clients up to date with the status of their projects. All you need to do is to think about the business side of your product. We think about the IT solutions which will make your work easier and raise the bar for your competition.
